36 void Filter::downsampleCloud(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_downsampled)
37 {
38  ROS_INFO("Filtering with leaf size: %f", _leaf_size);
39  double res = Utils::computeCloudResolution(cloud);
40  // ROS_INFO("Pointcloud size before downsampling: %zu",cloud->points.size());
41  ROS_INFO("Pointcloud resolution before downsampling: %f", res);
42 
43  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZRGB> downsampling_filter;
44  downsampling_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
45  const Eigen::Vector4f downsampling_leaf_size(_leaf_size, _leaf_size, _leaf_size, 0.0f);
46  downsampling_filter.setLeafSize(downsampling_leaf_size);
47  downsampling_filter.filter(*cloud_downsampled);
48 
49  res = Utils::computeCloudResolution(cloud_downsampled);
50  // ROS_INFO("Pointcloud size after downsampling: %zu",cloud_downsampled->points.size());
51  ROS_INFO("Pointcloud resolution after downsampling: %f", res);
52 }
53 
54 void Filter::filter_noise(double threshold, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_filtered)
55 {
56  // ROS_INFO("create box with threshold: %f",threshold);
57  pcl::CropBox<pcl::PointXYZRGB> boxFilter;
58 
59  // get box center
60  Eigen::Vector3f boxTranslatation;
61  Eigen::Vector4f centroid;
62  pcl::compute3DCentroid(*cloud, centroid);
63  boxTranslatation[0] = centroid[0];
64  boxTranslatation[1] = centroid[1];
65  boxTranslatation[2] = centroid[2];
66  ROS_INFO("Point cloud center: (%f,%f,%f)", centroid[0], centroid[1], centroid[2]);
67 
68  // apply filter
69  boxFilter.setTranslation(boxTranslatation);
70  boxFilter.setMin(Eigen::Vector4f(-threshold, -threshold, -threshold, 1.0));
71  boxFilter.setMax(Eigen::Vector4f(threshold, threshold, threshold, 1.0));
72  boxFilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
73  boxFilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
74 }
75 
76 void Filter::filter_noise(Eigen::Vector3f cloud_center, double threshold, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud,
77  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_filtered)
78 {
79  pcl::CropBox<pcl::PointXYZRGB> boxFilter;
80 
81  ROS_INFO("Point cloud center: (%f,%f,%f)", cloud_center[0], cloud_center[1], cloud_center[2]);
82 
83  // apply filter
84  boxFilter.setTranslation(cloud_center);
85  boxFilter.setMin(Eigen::Vector4f(-threshold, -threshold, -threshold, 1.0));
86  boxFilter.setMax(Eigen::Vector4f(threshold, threshold, threshold, 1.0));
87  boxFilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
88  boxFilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
89 }
90 
91 void Filter::filter_floor(double threshold, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_filtered)
92 {
93  // Move cloud up if it has negative values
94  bool displace = false;
95  for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->points.size() && !displace; i++)
96  {
97  if (cloud->points[i].z < 0)
98  displace = true;
99  }
100 
101  // Apply z_offset
102  if (displace)
103  Utils::displaceCloud(cloud, cloud, 0, 0, 0.35);
104 
105  // ROS_INFO("create segmenter with threshold: %f",threshold);
106  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZRGB> seg;
107 
108  // Search for a plane perpendicular to z axis, 1 degree tolerance
109  Eigen::Vector3f axis;
110  axis << 0, 0, 1;
111  seg.setAxis(axis);
112  seg.setEpsAngle(pcl::deg2rad(1.0));
113  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients(true);
114  seg.setModelType(pcl::SACMODEL_PERPENDICULAR_PLANE);
115  seg.setMethodType(pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
116  seg.setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
117  seg.setInputCloud(cloud);
118 
119  pcl::ModelCoefficients coeff;
120  pcl::PointIndices indices_internal;
121  seg.segment(indices_internal, coeff);
122 
123  if (indices_internal.indices.size() == 0)
124  {
125  ROS_ERROR("Unable to find floor.");
126  }
127  else
128  {
129  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGB> extract_indices_filter;
130  extract_indices_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
131  extract_indices_filter.setIndices(boost::make_shared<std::vector<int>>(indices_internal.indices));
132  extract_indices_filter.setNegative(true);
133  extract_indices_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
134  }
135 }
136 
137 void Filter::setLeafSize(double new_leaf_size)
138 {
139  _leaf_size = new_leaf_size;
140 }
141 
142 void Filter::run(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_filtered)
143 {
144  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud, *cloud_filtered);
145 
146  // Filter floor
147  if (_floor_filter_threshold > 0)
148  filter_floor(_floor_filter_threshold, cloud_filtered, cloud_filtered);
149 
150  // Filter noise
151  if (_noise_filter_threshold > 0)
152  {
153  // with given center
154  if (_user_given_center)
155  filter_noise(_cloud_center, _noise_filter_threshold, cloud_filtered, cloud_filtered);
156  // without given center
157  else
158  filter_noise(_noise_filter_threshold, cloud_filtered, cloud_filtered);
159  }
160 
161  // Downsample
162  downsampleCloud(cloud_filtered, cloud_filtered);
163 }
